scripts.docker:build: pnpm --silent --workspace-root pnpm-context -- apps/inbound-mail/Dockerfile | docker build --build-arg PACKAGE_PATH=apps/inbound-mail - -t novu-inbound-mail
scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"strictNullChecks": false}' TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=test E2E_RUNNER=true mocha --timeout 10000 --require ts-node/register --exit --file e2e/setup.ts src/**/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:e2e: cross-env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"strictNullChecks": false}' TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=test E2E_RUNNER=true mocha --timeout 10000 --require ts-node/register --exit --file e2e/setup.ts e2e/**/*.e2e.ts src/**/*.e2e.ts
